metadata.title: CVE-2020-14365 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine, in ansible-engine 2.8.x before2.8.15 and ansible-engine 2.9.x before 2.9.13, when installing packagesusing the dnf module. GPG signatures are ignored during installation evenwhen disable_gpg_check is set to False, which is the default behavior. Thisflaw leads to malicious packages being installed on the system andarbitrary code executed via package installation scripts. The highestthreat from this vulnerability is to integrity and system availability.

criterions.comment: ansible package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
